# The King of Blaze

The King of Blaze may refer to:
*The King of Blaze (manhua), a Taiwanese comic book series
**The King of Blaze (TV series), a 2018 Chinese television series based on the manhua

---

#REDIRECT The King of Blaze (manhua)
